explains: adj. 美味的；讲究的；秀丽的；挑剔的

sentences.en: The wolf thought he was in joke, and came one night to get a dainty morsel.
sentences.cn: 狼以为他是在开玩笑，一天晚上来取美味的食物。

sentences.en: After a dainty egg and fish dinner, Tom said he wanted to learn to smoke, now.
sentences.cn: 吃了一顿美味的蛋和鱼之后，汤姆说他现在想学抽烟。

sentences.en: I should never have thought, dear boy of mine, that you were so dainty and fussy about your food.
sentences.cn: 我的好孩子，我从来没想到你对食物这么讲究，这么挑剔。
